topic.title: HP Helion 1.0 Development Platform: Adding System Services

body.p: Application Lifecycle Service has two Service definitions:

ul.li: System Services: Service types (e.g. MySQL, RabbitMQ, Filesystem) available for use on the system
Provisioned Services: Instances of the System Services created for end user applications

body.p:
The helion services
command will show a list of all System Services available on the current target, as well as a list of Provisioned Services allocated to the authenticated user.

Administrators can configure external data services to work in the same way as core Application Lifecycle Service System Services, exposing existing software and infrastructure for use by Application Lifecycle Service and its users.
